problem_description: Level 2 Physics - Verifying Causality and Gravity

training_data.comment: An object dropped from rest (initial_velocity=0) after 2 seconds.
The distance the same object has fallen in 2 seconds.
An object THROWN downwards with an initial velocity.
Negative Knowledge: Verifying that an incorrect final velocity fails the check.
Negative Knowledge: Verifying that an incorrect distance fails the check.
